name: DispatchQueue.SchedulerOptions
desc: A set of options that affect the operation of the dispatch queue scheduler.

items.name: init(qos: DispatchQoS, flags: DispatchWorkItemFlags, group: DispatchGroup?)
items.desc: Creates a dispatch queue scheduler options instance with the given options.

items.name: var qos: DispatchQoS
items.desc: The dispatch queue quality of service.

items.name: var flags: DispatchWorkItemFlags
items.desc: The dispatch queue work item flags.

items.name: var group: DispatchGroup?
items.desc: The dispatch group, if any, to use when performing actions.
